moves.1... Nf6: has been demonstrated there on the shore...
moves.5. Bd2: as we put our callus minds...
moves.8. Bd3: make our pieces move into ever greater incandescent thoughts...
moves.8... e5: sparta will defend the gates of doom...
moves.9. Ne4: and they are carrying my anxiety at arms length in sadness
moves.9... Bg4: that I will not be with them again....
moves.10. Nfg5: Through the fog we are leading.
moves.10... Nxe4: Not sure of what will float this day.
moves.11. Nxe4: But my men and I are doing something,
moves.11... Bf5: and know that we will carry the day.
moves.12. d5: I would pour a glass of the best scotch in the house .
moves.13. Kxd2: You are a very good friend:)
moves.13... Nb4: I will end it with this:
moves.14... c6:
Horizontal icicles of pure ice strike my back and 
bore aspirations through my heart.
moves.16. Qxd3: I could say "check", then watch the bishop of black squares hunger for the white ones.
moves.16... c5:
For are not the white ones (of squares) always
first?
moves.17. f3: And by definition, then they are the prized ones? The best ones?
moves.17... Qd7: But the white ones want the red ones, where blood has been spent and paid for.
moves.18... Rfb8: Do we always want what others have?
moves.19. Nf2: Do the rules tell us to reach farther than reach can exist?
moves.19... b5: Tilt all the squares until they are 90 degrees, then they bellow that this is quite enough.
moves.20. Rac1: And, in unison, they ask "what do we want?".
moves.20... bxc4:
I straighten my spine and spike my hair. In L.A. coffee houses, all the boards are gray.
In the dark.
moves.21. Qa2: And here is where beautiful surpasses pretty, and extraordinary trumps all else.
moves.21... Rb3:
And those who have it never look back to lesser ones.
It may hurt to see them.
In the court of fame, one cannot lose with a one-sided coin.
Mate!
moves.22. Nd1: Do you prefer the dark? The ones?
moves.23. e4: The "U" can go up or down, you know.
moves.23... Rd3+: So soft on top, razor blades on bottom.
moves.24. Ke2:
I prefer to stay white. Squares.
But if black could go first, then that is a different color.
And game.
moves.24... Bxe4: Then I would prefer, absolutely, the black ones.
moves.33. Rg3: wot a pleasant game this was:))))
moves.34... Ra1 35. Qxh6 Qxd1+: Thank you friend! I'm looking forward to another great game!
